entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9626] It is expected that ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of 122,656,000 reported in the network role https://www.kogeneracja.com.pl/role/ias_1_role-310000_reported_1 should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ComprehensiveIncome with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 122,674,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role https://www.kogeneracja.com.pl/role/ias_1_role-610000_reported_5, https://www.kogeneracja.com.pl/role/ias_1_role-610000_reported_6. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : PLN Decimals of ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -3 Decimals of ComprehensiveIncome : -3 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900IIZX8UAI8MJ703/2020-12-31/ESEF/PL/0/KOGENERACJA-2020-12-31.zip/KOGENERACJA-2020-12-31/reports/KOGENERACJA-2020-12-31.xhtml 12807

property.name: label
property.value: Comprehensive income, attributable to owners of parent

entry.message:
[DQC.IFRS.0129.9628] It is expected that ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests with a value of 2,019,000 reported in the network role https://www.kogeneracja.com.pl/role/ias_1_role-310000_reported_1 should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ComprehensiveIncome with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterestsMember and a reported value of 2,001,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role https://www.kogeneracja.com.pl/role/ias_1_role-610000_reported_5, https://www.kogeneracja.com.pl/role/ias_1_role-610000_reported_6. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests fact are:
